ref.title: Interactions of CO2 with the homologous series of SnMIMBF4 ionic liquids studied in situ ATR-FTIR spectroscopy: spectral characteristics, thermodynamic parameters and their correlation
ref.full: Shalygin, A. S.; Nesterov, N. S.; Prikhod'ko, S. A.; Adonin, N. Y.; Martyanov, O. N.; Kazarian, S. G. (2020) J. Mol. Liq. 315, 113694.
